Name: CLASHBOWL
About the game: This VR bowling game makes you feel good & relaxed fast! Have fun & enjoy the best VR bowling atmosphere & graphics! Exactly like in real life right from your own comfort And without leaving your house! Yeah, you heard it right! You bring the cookies and drinks... While we bring the fun! Feel just like in a real bowling club due to our ultra realistic physics system and mind blowing graphics. Yeah, we hired aliens from another planet! Freely move everywhere you want, not just on the bowling area! Enjoy the amazing bowling venues! See your score live on a huge TV (just like in real life) Compete against other players and be in top 20 ranking! Play multiplayer against your friends or family using the same headset. Explore the venues and conquer their top ranking! 1. Las Vegas (USA) 2. Juksu Castle (South Korea) 3. Space Station (USA) 4. Winterberg (Germany) 5. Alberta (Canada) 6. Balaceanca (Romania) 7. Rome (Italy) 8. London (UK) 9. Rio de Janeiro (Brazil) Much more are on their way out! Anyway, good luck with the first strike! Now grab the game and let's see you in action!
